text: 12.5: Jop 5.17; Snd 3.11-12Ee, nde, Fhe Bakɨme nde ndavi havharɨr zav suaŋgi kameŋ, nde ne ndɨkndɨk ŋangi thi? Ana kha suambarar nde muuŋgi, nde nan ŋkaa ma. Ana maaŋ nde nzuav, khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu nan kam ma. Guma Bakɨme maaŋ muuŋgip, nde muuŋgi tɨva mbatɨga thueŋ ndiv, thɨgar maaŋ saŋv bigɨn thuen nden muuŋgirim, nde kha ndɨkndɨgar mba bigen muuŋ thari, ne fhura ki bigeŋ ma. Nde vhɨra ne suaŋv pim ndavi simɨ visu thari.
